attributes.action: Replace guided bus plans with driver-less systems like ULTra or Bus Lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the bus is guided, why does it need a driver? If it has a driver, why does it need to be guided?

Driver-less systems, like ULTra, are cheaper to run, especially at night and during bank holidays. The existing installations at Heathrow and Cardiff prove that the technology works.

I don't have any financial interest in BAA or ULTra. I just believe in the product for the transport needs of Britain's towns and cities. Check out the website.
